## RpcCallHandler class

RPC调用处理器 负责处理来自客户端的RPC调用请求

**Signature:**

```text
export declare class RpcCallHandler extends EventEmitter 
```
**Extends:** [EventEmitter](./ecs-framework-monorepo.eventemitter.md)
